Best game
10/10
Would play again
also portal 3 plz
Eines der (zumindest mit freunden) witzigsten spiele die ich gespielt habe Definitiv eine empfelung,wenn man einen Freund hat zum mitspielem,
和好基友一起玩这游戏，一起吹逼，真的很欢乐。
Mükemmel bilr oyun.
Злодей, которого хочется обнять
10 Гладос/10 картошек
Отличная игра.
Наверное лучшая игра в своем роде. Рекомендую.

Bought the game for the quality Valve storytelling, but stayed for the pleasure I got from berating my college roommate for not being smart enough in coop. 

Great/8, would ruin another friendship and create a toxic living environment again.
Best potato ever

Если вы 5 лет откладывали эту игру на дальнюю полку и всё это время ждали, что небеса подадут вам знак, то это он. 
Да-да, именно этот обзор. 
Вот он, знак, вы дождались. 

А теперь взяли себя в руки и приготовили себя к самой потрясающей игре, что когда-либо рождалась в недрах офиса Valve. Замечательно. Смотрите под ноги и следите за своими словами. Точнее, их отсутствием.

P.S. Батареи из картошки - это действительно отстой.
Excellent jeu coop ET solo !
Good game
wow. beautiful. amazing. короче, нравится мне до сих пор. мастхэв!
masterpiece.
Spettacolo
Если выбирать игру с отличными сюжетом и персонажами, неоднозначными головоломками и кооперативом, то это безусловно Portal 2. Игра, воспоминания о которой, останутся надолго.
買
GLaDOS depois da musiquinha no final do primeiro jogo merece 'Vilão mais carente de um abraço' no Steam Awards.

Игра просто бомба.
10 порталов из 10.

Even After all these years, I'll never get that party trick Achievement.

Though to get more into it, Portal 2 is one of the few puzzle games that hasn't aged at all. Even years and years after release it still feels unique and can still have some challenge behind it, more so if you go through the workshop's massive library that's still growing to this day. 

And the prices this game hits during sales are downright criminal.

Сиквел, каким он должен быть, Portal в квадрате.
Сюжетная компания, кооператив, доступный инструментарий и куча модификаций выжимают все соки из этого жанра.
Excelente juego siempre me entretengo un buen rato jugndolo :3
Tééééééééééérible

Superbe jeu qui vous plonge au coeur de casse-têtes géants. Un must have pour tout joueur qui se respecte :)

Le contenu proposé par la communauté permet de prolonger le jeu avec de nouveaux défis.

Espérons qu'un jour Valve apprenne un jour à compter jusqu'à 3...

Un juego de puzzles perfectamente diseñados.
La dificultad es progresiva y en ningún momento se siente aburrido.
Tiene una gran historia cargada de humor y sarcasmo.
Sencillamente este juego es genial.
One of the best games of all time
Perfeito para iniciar um jogo descompromissado e acabar querendo jogar e jogar, querendo resolver todo puzzle e descobrir mais da Aperture!

Heuresement que j'ai 45 de QI, avec ça j'ai réussi à finir le jeu.
Nan c'est faux..

Хорошая игра.
This is one of my favorite games ever. If you haven't already played this game, PLAY IT NOW.

CE jeu est juste sublime !
Univers "décalé" et tres prenant !

Ce jeu est aussi bien en solo qu'en coop !

Nagyon ötletes játék, aki nem egy no-brain játékot keres, az nem fog csalódni. Valószínűleg a legtöbb embernek már nem kell bemutatni a koncepciót, és bár nem mai darab, simán megállja a helyét 2017-ben is a játékpiacon. Amellett hogy gondolkodni kell, nagyon frappáns szövegek vannak benne, és ha van valaki akivel játszhatsz, akkor a coop rész is kötelező, garantált szórakozás. 10/10
10 GLaDOS из 10

Portal 2 has to be one of the most clever and fun puzzle games I have ever played. The dialogue and puzzles help create a experience that everyone should try out even if you don't care for puzzle games that often
This game is timeless IYNWIM

Ich liebe den Witz und die Herrausforderung des Spieles an das logische Denken. Ich werd immer wieder gern Portal und Portal 2 spielen.

Kartoffelkuchen für alle! ;)

AMAZING!!!
Blew my mind!!
One of the best games I've played in my life
10/10 in my opinion.
Still one of my favorite games. The game itself isn't that long to complete but still there are the community test chambers <3
Отличная игра!
mmmm!    DAT SHIT GOOD
so many questions, so little answers
Хорошая игра (2017) (2018)
Wyśmienita gra logiczna. Jedynym zastrzeżeniem jest pewna schematowość w grze, którą można zauważyć po przejściu kilku pokoi.
Para ejercitar el cerebro, uno nunca se aburre, un excelente juego
Ненавижу, бл**ь, порталы!

Despiertas tras vete tu a saber cuanto tiempo en un habitaculo en ruinas y poco salubre, cuando te encuentras a una simpatica esfera con un ojo azul que tiene miedo a soltarse de su rail de transporta.

Acompañado de nuestro nuevo amigo recorreremos los decadentes pasillos, instalaciones y pruebas de Aperture Science Laboratories para lograr escapar y obtener tu merecida libertad y un trozo de rica tarta por el camino si es posible.
Good game, Co-op missions are the best tho, get it if you know someone else that have it.
Эта игра просто шедевр, я даже не знаю что ещё можно к этому добавить.
12/10, без лишних слов
historia engraçada, desafiador, e tem multiplayer
i love this game 10/10
Gra tak dobra, że aż trzeba było ją przejść w ten sam dzień co się kupiło
Yes, this is amazing.
quero insignia pls
The story of Portal 2 is amazing, as well as the gameplay. One of the "must plays" on Steam.

Um jogo que me encantou,  consigo dizer facilmente ser o melhor jogo que já joguei na minha vida, a emoção que me fez passar. Colocou na minha cabeça a definição de um bom jogo.

13/10 fajna gra lubie jom bardzo
Hey, this is pretty good

Sporting some of the best writing and voice work in years (as well as some deviously designed puzzles), Portal 2's single-player campaign is superior to its predecessor in every way. It's the co-op mode, however, that makes this 2011's first must-play game even for those gamers that don't like first-person or puzzle games.
ultima perla della valve
Best game ever, too fun! Coop is very very good also!

your a patato if you dislike this game
Meme-free version of an all time incredible puzzle game, plus the companion cube looks better this time. Also did I say meme-free? Yea not really.

this is a great game !

[h1]TECHNICAL DETAILS[/h1]
[h2]Portal 2[/h2]
[b]App ID:[/b] 620
[b]Developed by:[/b] Valve
[b]Published by:[/b] Valve
[b]Released:[/b] 19 April 2011
[b]Current status:[/b] Fully released

[h1]PRICING INFORMATION[/h1]
[b]Current price:[/b] 8.19€ / 9.99$ / 7.19£ (for other currency's, click here: [url=https://steamdb.info/app/620/]SteamDB[/url]
[b]Biggest sale known (as of the date of this review):[/b] 90% off @ Steam Winter Sale 2019

[h1]PORTAL 2 IN A NUTSHELL[/h1]
👩‍🔬 You are participating at Aperture Science to complete tests!
🥔 It's an action-packed first-person puzzle game with a great storyline, awesome characters and lots of plot twists!
🍋 This game feels like the definition of logic and includes life lessons for pro's!
🍰 [spoiler]The cake is a lie![/spoiler]
🏆 It's currently the no. 1 top reviewed game on Steam!
🙏 Can be played in single-player or in co-op!
🎮 Can be played with a keyboard/mouse and a controller!
👨‍💻 A split-screen mode is included!
🗺️ A map editor is included!
🔧 Steam Workshop is supported and filled to the brim with custom content!

[h1]WHAT DO YOU NEED TO RUN PORTAL 2?[/h1]
🆒 Portal 2 is based upon the original Source Engine, which makes the game playable on practically anything modern.
🔆 The graphics are even good for today's standards.
📂 Portal 2 takes up 11.9GB of free storage.
🕗 The single-player campaign can be finished between 6-10 hours if you're playing it for the first time.

[h1]COMPARABLE GAMES[/h1]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/400/Portal/]Portal:[/url] The awesome predecessor of Portal 2!
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/17410/Mirrors_Edge/]Mirror's Edge:[/url] A solid parkour platformer with some awesome graphics and level design!
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1233570/Mirrors_Edge_Catalyst/]Mirror's Edge Catalyst:[/url] The solid successor to Mirror's Edge!
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/219890/Antichamber/]Antichamber:[/url] An awesome puzzle game which breaks your brain on many levels!

[h1]SOME AWESOME CONTENT ABOUT PORTAL 2[/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nd1m5_n9P9w
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lTfHR2L-KoQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e0Jr6OkueuY

[h1]MY FINAL THOUGHTS[/h1]
💚 Portal 2 is my personal favorite game of all time. 
💭 For me, it's the definition of how a game should be, fun, exciting and to take your mind off things.
📚 Portal 2 was recommended to me by my uncle and it was one of the first games I bought on this Steam account, together with Counter-Strike Source and Garry's Mod.

Thanks for reading my review! I wish you a great day and lots of positive thoughts!
Отличный юмор, загадки и атмосфера. 10/10

Attractive singleplayer but best w friends!
A must have in 2016.

Awesome game.
I love this game.
Це игра про бабу которая бегает с дыроколом и портит стены в стенах лабаратории, офисе и в стенах офиса старой лабаратории. Ничога не обычного.
